ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2011-1152 of September 29, 2011
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2011-1152 of September 29, 2011 to reduce the maximum amount of any funding agreement made under the GRANTS AND CONTRIBUTIONS TO SUPPORT CLEAN TRANSPORTATION PROGRAM after the making of this Order to $1,500,000 per project.
